problem.title: CheckPoint: Spinning Rod
problem.script:
#Enter the computations here l=random.choice([0.6,0.8,1.2]) m=random.choice([0.08,0.18,0.24]) v=random.choice([2.5,3.5,4.0])
L=25* m* v* l
problem.p: A light rigid rod of length 3L has small spheres of masses m, 2m, 3m and 4m attached as shown. The rod is spinning in a horizontal plane about a vertical axis passing through m. The linear speed of mass 3m is v = $v m/s.
If L = $l meters and m = $m kilograms, find the magnitude of the angular momentum of the rod about this axis.
